job.name: lana
job.command: # source ~/.tcshrc cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} # starver .DEV2 # setup gcc451 set evtsFile = $INPUTFILE0; set file = `basename $evtsFile .daq` echo "${evtsFile}" if (! -r ${evtsFile}) exit 1; set logFile = ${file}B.log set f=`find . -maxdepth 1 -type f -name "${file}*.root"` setenv STARFPE NO if ("$f" == "") then root.exe -q -b 'bfc.C(99999,"lana,B2003,Corr2,analysis,NoHistos,NoRunco,-HitFilt,-evout","'${evtsFile}'")' >& ${logFile} endif
